Race.SpecificTitle: Rd. Dist. #9, Wd. 3 -- 10.77 Mills - PJ - 10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 9, WARD 3 PROPOSITION
 (TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10-YEAR, 10.77 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND/OR REPAIRING PUBLIC ROADS AND BRIDGES IN ROAD DISTRICT NO. 9, WARD 3, INCLUDING DITCHING AND DRAINAGE THEREFOR AND PURCHASING OF EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 9, Ward 3 of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and seventy seven hundredths (10.77) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018 (an estimated $139,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and/or repairing public roads and bridges in the District, including ditching and drainage therefor and purchasing of equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Zwolle Sch. Dist. No. 61 -- 11.24 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ZWOLLE SCHOOL DISTRICT NO. 61 PROPOSITION
 (TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 11.24 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR OPERATING AND MAINTAINING PUBLIC SCHOOL HOUSES AND BUILDINGS AND OTHER SCHOOL FACILITIES IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Zwolle School District No. 61 of Sabine Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy an eleven and twenty-four hundredths (11.24) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $143,175) on all the property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of operating and maintaining public school houses and buildings and other school facilities in the District?
